author: Gmo (Guest)
title: Thanks
text:
Congratulations for your work, and thanks for your help. I appreciate your suggestions and tech information. I got my Samsung yesterday and was worried about how to solve installation Linux/Ubuntu problems in my laptop.
Sincerely
Guille from Nicaragua Central America
